website_summaries.verdict: A premium mid-tower case option from Corsair that sports a unique look and design.
pros: Tempered glass panels along the front, top, and sides allow LED lighting to shine through the case
Case offers better airflow with up to six case fans and 360-millimeter radiators
cons: Removing the tempered panels requires unscrewing the mounts, making it harder to access the interior

website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking case with lots of nice features. While it won't work for everyone, those who can use it are impressed with its design.
pros: Ample space for numerous components, including multiple fans
LED lighting and tempered glass design look attractive and modern
Case is easy to put together, and panels are simple to remove for easy access to encased system
cons: If you add extra fans, some may not be compatible with the controller
Some owners wish its cable management system was better

customer_reviews.title: This case is a work of art!
customer_reviews.text: This case is a work of art! Will buy again, highly recommend. - If you buy this, you better take your time with cable management to truly make this shine. Use RGB fans. - Con: The included RGB fans, though appreciated, don't have much variance in colors/flashing. - Solution: I bought/installed NZXT RBG fans:  &  - Motherboard:  - RAM:  - CPU Cooler:  - Was forced to buy this:  - Getting the two apps which control all of the colors took a bit to get up & running correctly, but once set up, are amazing! I alternate between all green & rainbow :p
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice case. Thoughtfully put together. A big caution though...I bought a Corsair H115i Pro to use in this case and there's not enough room up top to install it and still get a motherboard in...in my case the ASUS Maximus X. Given all the bells and whistles (RGB and such) and using a cooler from the same manufacturer I was surprised it was that cramped. Even a board with less heatsink would end up partially behind the fans...Micro ATX MB would be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking well designed case
customer_reviews.text: Good looking well designed case. The mesh is magnetic behind the glass panels, which makes it easy to access items after it is built. Plenty of radiator room, even if you go with too big of a reservoir. Things to note; no vertical gpu support, Fan hookup(taking up 3 fan connectors on mobo),Bottom mounted PSU put the CPU power cable at max length.
customer_reviews.author: Cory M

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it used
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case, bought it used. It said packaging would be slightly damaged. Okay so yeah the box was a little messed up but i was missing 11 screws to the glass panels which arnt regular screws and it came with NO rgb contorller or fans AT ALL?? Shoulda just spent the extra 30 bucks for a new one. So yeah I recommend the case if bought brand new because i ended up purchasing a new one and it looks amazing.But i was decieved by a very innacurate description of this case in specific.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 USB 3.0 ports, no USB 3.1/Type-C
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely not order this again. It looks nice, but it only has two USB 3.0 ports on the top, one of which was damaged on the case I got, and no USB Type C. I wish I had ordered something else.
customer_reviews.author: half5

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is a fantastic value. You get 3 LL120 fans, a 6-port iCue controller, and all the other typical things you'd expect in a PC case. The tempered glass looks super sleek however I'd -highly- recommend wearing nitrile gloves when handling the case as the glass shows fingerprints pretty badly. There is a cowl for the PSU and the backplate offers a reasonable amount of space for cable management. The back plate can be pretty tricky to get back on properly which makes me hesitate to get back there to fix a few minor things. Apart from my minor complaints, I'd buy this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Andres

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tower
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. It's not as heavy as my former full size tower even with the tempered glass panels, and the size makes it more manageable to move. The magnetic fan screens come off with ease, and the RGB lighting on the fans highlights dust on the screen so you know when it's time for a wash. Yeah, a wash. I rinse the screens off in my kitchen sink, tamp them dry, and plop them back on. The only thing I wish this tower had was a busy light, so I could tell if the CPU is under any kind of load at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great look! Love the white though the case could be slightly bigger and have a few more entry points for wires in the back. It's a great case! Cons: the way the tempered glass side comes off scares me a bit especially when it sticks and I really have to give it a pull. Edit: After putting it together fully the case looks amazing but the ports for the wires are horrible and the rubber rings are more trouble than they’re worth I had to cut them out they were messing up the wires as I was trying to put them through.
customer_reviews.author: FishslayinDad

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this case
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most elegant and pristine case I've ever owned. The glass just pops! It's material quality is expected of Corsair (solid). Very easy to install everything, wire management is as good as it gets. Love the magnetic snap on screens too. Should come with everything you need. The sp120 rgb fans are like first generation rgb, not bad, but I ended up swapping them with LL120$ plus node pro kit. Looks incredible! Been building PC's for over 15 years and this case topped all the others in the past. It really contributed to probably the smoothest PC building process I've ever experienced. 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case, greatly restricts air flow
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful case, and if cosmetics are the most important to you it is arguably the best on the market. However, the glass+mesh top and front greatly restrict the air flow through the system. I see significant (~5C) temperature drop on my custom water loop when the glass and mesh is removed. I've removed the mesh permanently and just use the glass front and top, this is a bit of a paint to assemble in this manner but is a good mix of function and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: William Kandel

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I installed a full RGB setup. I wish the fans could be linked to motherboard for controls, but I would have to buy new fans / controller to do so. Only major downfall is the metal to hold the wires in a channel on the backside is quite difficult to get re-attached when everything is hooked up the way it should be. I even spent extensive time attempting to reduce and make sure the minimal amount of wires were behind this. There is JUST ENOUGH space in my opinion. Definitely pushing its limits.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good quality, lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: Great case, I'm glad I ordered this over the cheaper case I was looking at. This case has plenty of space, and looks amazing. Only 'bad' aspect is you really should spend the extra time to manage cables, and probably go the extra effort to get better cables than provided simply because you will be looking at them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: KesDl

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this case. Have had it now for 4 months and still have not seen one I like better. It is functional -- Holds my x570 motherboard and RX5700 graphics card. Only needed to order one additional fan for back of case. Looks great -- tempered glass on all sides except bottom and back, with clear view from both sides; cool RGB color display options for fans; and covers to hide cables for a clean build (see photos). Also has fast USB C (3.2 Gen 2 10Gb/sec) port on top front, which is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: balex06

customer_reviews.title: YAS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case when it first came out and just purchaed another for my boyfriends PC. This case is stunning, heavy duty and beautiful. I have no issues keeping it clean since it comes apart easily and even with my furry pets it has no scratches! This case is amazing and I Highly reccomend it! The only con is there is no shroud cover, I ended up getting some black craft foam and cutting out the shape where wires can be seen and ploped it in place and now its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AdoraBrutality

customer_reviews.title: Motherbord compatibilty issues!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful but buyers beware, even though they have partnered up with Asus not every Asus ATX motherboard will fit this case even though it should. The Asus Formula XI will not fit this case without grinding a bigger cut for the preinstalled motherboard shield. I don't mind modifying normally, but I do mind modifying for basic functionalty; like installing a motherboard that's supposed to fit in a case. Serious design flaw and I'm pissed off about it!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Noe

customer_reviews.title: Has to be showcased.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical coming from the Phanteks Enthoo Evolv but the case was too hot. I delidded my 8086K and I normally push my 2080Ti and the Phanteks was turning into one big heatsink. The 570X has much more room to breathe with the same fan configuration. This was worth every bit of effort. This case is also extremely spacious and should appease anyone looking to add more or do custom cable management. I love it, the material feels pretty solid except for the shed and putting the cover back on.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Black is Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case. Absolutely gorgeous in mirror black. A lot of reviews complain about the power supply compartment being exposed, but it seems they fixed that because on mine it is not at all. Can be somewhat heavy, due to all the tempered glass. Not a problem for me, but keep that in mind. My completed PC weighs approximately 37lbs. Don't buy this if you're not prepared to put in a lot of good cord management.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corsair Quality has always been the best
customer_reviews.text: VERY CLEAN CASE , I purchase cases often to find the perfect one. I came across this case and found it very interesting. Purchased , tested it out so far for 2 months. True glass , not plexi glass . Actual functional filtration that truely keeps the insides clean. I did replace the original fans for Icetek 5pack RGB and everything is so perfect. Airflow is exceptional as well as the internals after 2 months have remained spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Aliberto

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this case
customer_reviews.text: To be fair it was exactly what I wanted. It isn't a huge footprint, and very simple with good airflow. I moved all the stock fans to the top and back and mounted a radiator and third fan back in the front. With no air cooler it has plenty of space to light up and look pretty. The drive bays came out nicely and freed up some space for cable management in the bottom. The glass panel on the front looks amazing as well and still maintains great airflow from the sides. The addition of the 6 port fan LED controller was great too. Everything fired up and was configured in iCue about as fast as I could install it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L

customer_reviews.title: Second to absolutely none.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing does this case justice until you see one up close and actually do a build withone. They thought of everything. CORSAIRS R&D department is out of this world. When you see how much attention to detail is but into making this case you'll truly appreciate it but you'll have to get close to it (work on) to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking chassis.
customer_reviews.text: Cable management was the hardest thing to get right with this case - just took some more time to get everything in place. It looks sharp, though. I went with the Mirror Black glass and some bright LEDs inside. The mirror finish does dull out the light inside pretty significantly compared to non-mirrored tempered class. It's pretty much like a one way mirror effect, too. So it's a black box until I turn it on, then all the goodies become visible. I think there are options to vertically mount a GPU - there are two vertical slots on the back, but it doesn't come with a bracket or riser cable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Damit

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a white case, got the black one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "CORSAIR CRYSTAL 570X RGB Mid-Tower Case, 3 RGB Fans, Tempered Glass - White (CC-9011110-WW)" case. I ended up getting a black one after delayed shipping. Of course I can exchange it, but that's a HUGE inconvenience to send it back (it's not like it's a notebook / small) and wait a week for it to ship (delivery after March 1. I needed this setup for work and can't delay that long so had to stick with it. It's a nice case, but not sure why it's hard to miss the color I ordered when shipping. I wonder if I would have gotten the right case ordering from Corsair directly... assume so. Good luck if you get one!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely GORGEOUS case. Do you believe in love at first RGB? (Mirror Black SE)
customer_reviews.text: Smitten with this build, SMITTEN I tell ya. I find myself just staring at the case all the time. As the RGB's gracefully dance around. The Corsair 570X may have seen slight revisions since first introduced late 2016 or maybe just the SE (unsure). The PSU cover on the unit I received has a removable front panel now to hide the spaghetti. Thumb screws for the tempered glass panels are a 4mm hex head and slimmer. The top I/O replaces one USB 3.0 Type-A with a Type-C and the Corsair Logos are now RGB and in iCUE are identified as SP RGB fans.
customer_reviews.author: ez

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: Really great case but it is heavy once all the goody's are inside. only down side is finger prints. Keeping the glass clean kind of sucks but it sure is sexy !!! Did I mention the case I bought came with the updated PSU shroud and cable pass thru on top of it. Thanks for hearing us Corsair.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: msi carbon x399 is slightly too big to put the fans and radiator in the top of the case had to install this into the front panel instead. I didn't realize at first the plates the fans attach to are interchangable front to top.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: First Build
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this case. It was PLENTY big to fit all my parts with room to add more if necessary. I’ll list the mods below! Cable management was VERY simple with this case. It was my first build, and I seemed to be able to manage as I built very smoothly. Specs: Motherboard-ASRock Z370 Extreme4 CPU-Intel i7-8700k RAM-CORSAIR Vengeance (2x8GB) DDR4 3200MHz C16 GPU-ASUS Strix GeForce RTX 2080 Samsung 500GB SSD EVGA 850w power supply Beautiful case and very build-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Haili

customer_reviews.title: Remove the front panel!!
customer_reviews.text: Altho a very cool looking case indeed, it is not cool from a temperature standpoint. Significant heat problems, that were solved by having to remove the front glass panel (just in front of the 3 led fans). Once removed temps dropped significantly. Had I known this, a regular case or a case with just glass panels on the sides would have done fine and saved me a couple of bucks. YMMV. **09/30/20 - All case fans have failed. They have no warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Harold & Zachk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but be careful on liquid cooling top mount.
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove 1 fan to make a top-mount corsairs liquid cooling system fit. Beyond that, this case allows for some clean cabling and a pretty look. Fans are quiet, and everything just works. At worst.. the back cabling concealer bracket was a little tight after installation. If that was a smidge bigger, it would have been a great help.
customer_reviews.author: Fugetabutit

customer_reviews.title: Bought 8 months ago..
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty case, all my friends love it. Wiping it down can get irritating over time, but that's what makes it shine and look nice, so it is definitely worth it. Only reason for issues is the middle RGB fan that was included with the case has started go go bad; making a terrible rattling noise. Fans die over time, so this is to be expected. The other two appear to be going strong, so this is probably an isolated incident and likely occurred when I moved.
customer_reviews.author: rainydev

customer_reviews.title: Cool case bro
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way everything fit in here. The cable management was great. The icue software is a little confusing so I will watch the tutorial. I like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Luthien

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space for running clean cabling. Looks awesome! I will say that something should have been included for the 3 front fans and that is a fan power splitter but I ordered one for around 10 bucks. Also you have to order the rear fan separately, but if you get the same one then it integrates just fine. Don't forget that if you want to make your computer run faster all you need to do is add some RGB effects :) LoL j/k
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Randolph

customer_reviews.title: PSU slot is a nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: This case looks nice. I almost like everything about it expect for the PSU slot. Maybe my 1200 W Rosewill PSU is too big? I do not think so. It is so hard to slide the PSU in with the cables connected! Also for some reason the PSU slot is right below the 2 giant fans of my Titan RTX. Imagine how hot this region gets. Advice: know where each component will be located on your motherboard before buying this case.
customer_reviews.author: Cain Hades

customer_reviews.title: Looks futuristic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my most recent PC build. It looks simply amazing! It is perfect for a water cooling system with a decently sized reservoir. If you are going to incorporate water cooling for more than just the processor, I would go with a larger case. Other than that, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rubark Established 2014

customer_reviews.title: Simply stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a new build with RGB. Cable management on the back was a bit tricky but looks great when done. The tempered smoked glass is great and RGB doesn't blast through and blind you. Great air flow. Only thing I wish this case came with was the ll120 fans and the pro node. Beware that you can only use the same fans that come with this case with the hub that this has. They are the lower end fans but do the job well and sync up with MSI mystic light software.
customer_reviews.author: Shinobi

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great case.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, the shipping box is the most secure I’ve ever seen. When you open it the case is huge. Plenty of room for everything you need to install. Cable management routes are perfect and plenty. The case itself has Velcro straps in the back to further the help with cable magnet. The power supply cover Inc the bottom lights up to show a Corsair logo. There is not exhaust fan but another shouldn’t cost more than $20. Be sure to buy the same fan as the ones included with the case as these only have lighting in the center and do not have the RGB ring around the fan itself.
customer_reviews.author: Louis villegas

customer_reviews.title: Love the Case - Installation and Cables were tricky
customer_reviews.text: Pros - End Result is Clean Looking Case - Cleaning the tempered glass is very simple. - Setting up Fans with Corsair Commander and LED strips was simple with planning (thanks to whoever created this diagram). - Shroud over the power supply is wonderful. Cons - Radiator Mounting is frustrating because top mounting can interfere with motherboard coverings - Back is clear, so expect extra time for clean cable runs. - Wish the shroud over the power supply was removable
customer_reviews.author: Struse

customer_reviews.title: ok case but has some real downsides
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this case for a week or so and the shortcomings are apparent. The top of the case does not have enough clearance for a radiator if you are using anything other than specific low profile ram. one of the front case fans has an LED that has gone out already and considering the price of these fans it may be a bit before I can replace it. Considering the brand and the price I expected a little more here. The gap at the front is nice for air flow and the color scheme is nice but the lower build quality is already starting to show after such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful Tempered Glass Case
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case, very showcase worthy. Cable management is "ok" on the back side if you dont have a modular psu, OR if your cables are kinda thick. Overall I had fun building my Editing/Gaming Rig Temps aren't as bad as ppl say. Under load my CPU doesn't go past 75c. Ryzen 3700x Processor AsRock X570 TaiChi Mobo Corsair 32Gb Ram @3000Mhz Corsair HX850 PSU Samsung M.2 500gb This Case, an all Corsair fans
customer_reviews.author: Craig G

customer_reviews.title: Very refined and elegant case to showcase  your build skills
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my desk and makes a definite statement for your build skills! Very little area to hide anything so plan carefully. My only gripe is the fan/RGB controller wires are a bit out of control (there are a lot of wires)! Fans are quite bright and very quiet. Installation was very easy. I love this case! The right side of the case is where the real challenge begins. Your routing of wires and attention to detail will pay off big time here... So plan carefully!
customer_reviews.author: S. House

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this case is awesome easy to work in great cable management my only wish is that i had the option to not have the glass tinted i would just like the option for clear glass bc i really want to show off the inside components with that said the glass is not too dark you can still clearly see everything inside and it does add a cool look to the build
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: the glass was fragile and broke by itself.
customer_reviews.text: when i took off the panels, which was common but not that frequent it was easy to do so however BOTH the front and back panels broke by seemingly by themselves. Shattered glass got everywhere. The first panel that shattered still had the plastic wrap on it so i was able to keep the mess to a minimum but i was not so lucky for the second. It is a stunning case, but the fact that i was sent faulty side panels irritates me. (Contacting corsair for a replacement) Edit: I just received replacement panel from corsair free of charge! They were understanding of my situation and quickly sent replacements!
customer_reviews.author: John P Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case but one of the pegs that holds the panel on the front came broken. I'll be reaching out to customer support to see about a replacement. Update, customer support sent me a box of pegs to replace the one that broke. The case is nice, the screens prevent dust from entering the case, and the front fits my 320mm radiator nicely.
customer_reviews.author: woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with lighting node as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love my case! It's easy to keep clean and the micro filters stop a lot of the dust particles. The fans are bright and super quiet, but I'm upset that my case didn't come with the lighting node. Fortunately, my motherboard had just enough fan and rgb connectors for the 3 case fans and the wraith cooler, but I'm going to need to get a lighting node if I want to put in any other cooling.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Input / Output panel defective and needed replacement. The fans in front of the case are going out and rattling like a jet taking off in less than 3 months. Poor cable management capability. The case is heavy, but I guess that should have been expected. You will enjoy this thing for the first week if put together nicely, however the reality will set in that this case is heavy, poorly constructed, and uses cheap components for a premium price. (E.G. cheap fans, lack of normal i/o options) I started thinking about replacing this case for something more practical and of better quality in about week 3 of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: N. Germin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Case
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely gorgeous, makes your PC the centerpiece of your room. The way lights come through the inside or reflect off of it will make you want to cry from joy.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Close
customer_reviews.text: The wire routing cover is too small and corsairs proprietary rgb plug is annoying. The case is very well made, high quality tempered glass. Excellent air flow if you put more fans in. They could have saved some money by not putting push button controller inside the case. Over all a very handsome case.
customer_reviews.author: Power User

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy case for the enthusiast.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy, really pretty case. It was easy to get going and overall I am super pleased. The only thing I wish they would improve in the next version would be to provide an alternate power supply routing path. The most obvious pathway is not supported: directly in line from the PSU back plate where all the connectors are. Also, you can't access the PSU from the "top" side of the motherboard which is weird and inconvienant. Don't let this detract from my review though.. this is the best case I have ever ordered by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit

customer_reviews.title: RGB Display Case
customer_reviews.text: This is my first PC built. I have wanted this case ever since I first ever layed eyes on it. I think it looks so amazing especially when you start adding RGB to it. This case is perfect for showing off your RGB! The only Con I have with this case is that the wire cover on the back of the case is EXTREMELY hard to get back on once you put your thick braided cables through it. Other then that, this case is great! I am planning on upgrading and adding some more RGB in this case in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Skurk

customer_reviews.title: Stop saying this is small
customer_reviews.text: This PC isn’t small, and is incredibly easy to build in. The grommets and tie downs are perfectly placed. The fans are epic, quiet, LL’s are some of the best RGB fans, and there’s ample room to build in. I don’t understand people saying it’s “cramped.” Because it isn’t. This is very beginner and expert friendly. There’s enough tie downs and routing to do expert cable management and enough room just to say F it and close your panel with a mess in the back. The build quality is excellent as well. Corsair does a crazy job at making sure all their products go out well.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case with nice features,  the fans are a huge plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade my case and I love the fans that this comes with, I did end up purchasing another ll120 fan for the rear of the case as a exhaust fan. They is a lot of customization through the icue software. The case looks super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chapdelaine

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with fans or accessories...
customer_reviews.text: The case is very spacious even with the psu cage. It looks pretty sharp despite the somewhat flawed design. Gets finger prints easily, but the quality of the case is 5 stars. I gave this 3 out of 5 because all I received was a banged up box (though nothing was damaged inside) without any fans or screws/accessories. It came with a little bag that had the case manual and rgb fans manual. When I took the case out it felt as if it may have been refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K Janda

customer_reviews.title: One heck of a case with tempered glass walls!
customer_reviews.text: I nailed my assembly of parts into this case. This case is perfectly visual and can see both sides of the factory of computing. The polygonal filter aesthetic is very pleasing to the eye on the front and top sides. There is much room to fit a tall high-end cpu cooling heatsink as long as you manage it properly. Beware! This case is heavy with all the parts installed, and especially you do not want to drop your PC or bump into something with it with all the tempered glass panels; they are fragile and brittle, so handle with care. Well done Corsair!
customer_reviews.author: Jaolu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect White Build Case
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous case and so roomy for a mid sized tower. Had no trouble at all putting my parts in. Cable management was a little tricky because of how open it is and I’m a bit of a perfectionist but it all tied up really nicely. Plenty of nooks and crannies to hide cables and ties.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous case, decent value.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case. The fact that it comes with 3 LL120 fans already justifies the price and they're preinstalled and already wired up to the preinstalled lighting node. The glass is nice and thick, has dust filters all around and cable management was fairly easy with it. Bonus points for having the option to mount your GPU vertically. Really good airflow too by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Graham

customer_reviews.title: its good.
customer_reviews.text: its the most attractive pc case that isnt over the top or wall mountable that ive ever seen. i have the white version with all white LL fans and its the centerpiece in my living room. super easy to build..standoffs were already there....plenty of passthrough for wires and the shroud in the back can hide a surprising nest of wires. my version has a psu shroud panel in the front which was the primary gripe of everyone that bought one..your mileage may vary on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, using it in 2019 and it is still beautiful and modern. I had only one small problem with this glass case, is that my back panel popped in a few months. However, Corsair sent me the new one, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case, it's sleek and sexy to say the least and when you put the lights in, it really stands out! It has plenty of room to hold all your hardware and I love that they added the cover for the battery compartment to hide all the wires...A+++ to Corsair for doing that!!! Cable management is also done really well, I highly recommend this tower!
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the sickest looking cases out there. The look beats out other tempered glass cases and the quality is pretty nice. There are a few things I would've liked to have been different with this and the amount of room to run cables is a little tight but overall I'm happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McGarrity

customer_reviews.title: fitting problems caused by the case
customer_reviews.text: the case is very beautiful but my mobo is held in by 3 screws total because the pins and the mobo don't line up at all for the upper 3 pins. I had my mobo (asus rog maximus xi hero) in my old 50$ computer case before buying this corsair case, and it lined up just fine in the old case. this wasn't a case of needing to push it to line them up and screw it in while holding it. there was zero give left, the holes just simply did not line up at all. pretty disappointing considering the price and brand of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Glittergirl25

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and professional looking case
customer_reviews.text: This case is very pretty. Its professional looking but also cool looking. The tinted, mirrored glass is super nice and you can see whatever LED's you have inside without it being super obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This thing is clean!! (Mirrored Version)
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it look dope, but it builds well too. This was the first case I built my own PC in and I'm more than thrilled. The mirror finish is so clean. It's a heavy case but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Roach

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case
customer_reviews.text: Comes pretty much assembled. looks amazing and build quality is perfect. only gripe would be the panel screws are a little tough to first work with but after a couple times threading in and out it's flawless. FYI the panels are slightly tinted not clear but with a little rgb and lighting it looks great and doesn't make white LEDs too bright
customer_reviews.author: David price

customer_reviews.title: The pics are great, but honestly when you open it up you ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely GORGEOUS case! Anyone looking to build a new rig, or upgrade your rig to a nicer case should go with this! The pics are great, but honestly when you open it up you realize they didn't really do it justice, because once you power it up it looks beautiful, especially with RGB lighting that you may add along with the fans that come with it. Again, love the case and no issues with it what-so-ever! :)
customer_reviews.author: PC Modder

customer_reviews.title: Pictures don't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: This case is absolutely incredible. Lots of space to work with, easy cable management, and looks fantastic! Added 3 new Corsair fans for a total of 6. Lights up like a Christmas tree, easy air flow, and did I mention it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: .......Icue smart case. Be smart buy it
customer_reviews.text: It Comes With 3 LL120 Fans pre installed which is almost the cost of the case alone. Clean to setup has 2 screens top and front for dust The basement is smaller and compact so cable management is rough best to buy a modular PSU and use extentions You also need a rear fan however the option for liquid cooling gpu can go on the rear..... This case is top notch
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Most Thoughtful Case Ever Built!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - VERY easy to clean - VERY fast and convenient to clean - Strong and sturdy material - Clean layout inside to arrange everything without a sweat - Room inside to allow good circulation - Enough slots for drives and fans - Runs super silent Cons: - Expensive (actual NOT, for what it is. I would even pay $200 for this!)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jessop

customer_reviews.title: Best Tempered glass case.
customer_reviews.text: Best tempered glass case out there Pros: Good space for cable managment, Full tempered glass, magnetic dust filter, enough space for custom loops, look absolutely beautiful. Cons : Heavy, no holes for power switch cable to run to mainboard and Power supply case isn’t closed in front.
customer_reviews.author: Ashikul yousuf

customer_reviews.title: Screams quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Looks and feels high quality. Got the white one and keep white LEDs on and it looks like bonafide Hackintosh which I’m using it for :) Surprisingly quiet as well
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Water cooled PC
customer_reviews.text: Case is amazing but on the back side you got no room to stuff all the cables in and do a neat cable management .Did a Front 360 Pacific Radiator the fat one was only able to fit two fans had to remove the shroud cover to fit a d5 pump/reservoir also was able to fit a 240 mm on top . Let it be known Ya will need lots of FITTINGS TO DO A FULL loop like mine but overall the case looks amazing with asus Z390 e board .
customer_reviews.author: doodlez

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Easy to disassemble and reassemble! Had to move the case fans to make room for my CPU cooler's radiator, but that was an easy thing to do. Wire management was a little tight once I got everything in place, but it was my first build so I'm sure it could have been done better. Would recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Bought used ... Didn’t come with bottom psu filter that’s its suppose to come with
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t feel like waiting for the shipment of new ones so bought a used one screw of the top chasis didn’t screw properly or won’t screw in but other then that no issues highly recommend this case sleek and nice looking also it’s 170 mm but the 172mm cooler master air maker will fit barely with the the side glass giving it a tight squeeze
customer_reviews.author: Bleach

customer_reviews.title: A really sexy case
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space, very easy to assemble and cable management. I love the mirror glass but the only down side is the fan which have only a few option for rgb unless you spend $70 for a commander pro
customer_reviews.author: ta quoc khai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: If you have an aesthetic build and want to show it off this is the case for you! Cable management was extremely easy with this case. I installed 6 fans and was able to tuck all of my wires behind the cable plate\cover. This thing loves to attract fingerprints so make sure you've got plenty of glass cleaner wipes on hand. Airflow is great and my components never get above 60C under load. I went with this one over the 460X because of the additional corsair logo lights. It looks absolutely beautiful with my RGB build
customer_reviews.author: SudoDanny

customer_reviews.title: Best case I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I mean.. what can I say? I paid $130 for a case that is absolutely beautiful. Item was like new as said in description. Shipped one day earlier than the expected date. Assembly was quick with simple directions. Though cable management might be a challenge for inexperienced builders. All in all, I totally recommend this case, especially if you can get it $70 off retail price like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this case Is probably one the best-looking case in the market right now. Lighting software is a bit hard to understand but that's what google is for. My wife loved this case so much she ended up getting it in black for her build. The airflow is very good as well as the cable management in it.
customer_reviews.author: Frandy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome case. The glass reflects like a mirror...until you get a bunch of finger prints on it lol. But nothing was damaged in the box when I opened it and fits everything well. I love the lights but havent figured out how to work them yet
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money for worst customer support and non function RGB
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product last year and in February they release firmware upgrade. Form 6 fans only one led up. I worked with customer support from March until September and they did not fix the problem. I spend hours with the troubleshooting every time I call or email them. Finally I give up for bad customer services and non working product. Also I have over than 10 years IT experience imagine for some one has a little knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Case
customer_reviews.text: The case is organized very well and can give you a very clean setup. The only real gripe I would have is there is no reset button on the pc but you can use one of the fan controller buttons as a reset. The fans that come with the case are nice but I changed mine to the LL series due to the Corsair cooling pump I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Literally, everything you need, although the manual claims a 120mm fan for the rear is included, it was not, otherwise amazing case. PSU area has a vent at the bottom with a filter for the PSU fan, plenty of space at the top of the case for a radiator, plenty of room inside the case, excellent cable management systems for routing and hiding cabling behind the mobo. Comes with a fan controller and RGB controller. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: in love
customer_reviews.text: not much of a gamer, however this would be a great setup for a gamer enthusiasts. wire management and hiding is great. the lights on the front change to all colors on the wheel. lights inside aren't included, added those myself. reminds me of a fish tank. lol. but overall I love this case. the only thing I would change is that power buttons are on top of the tower. so it being mounted above my monitor makes it hard to turn off and on.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It was a pleasure building a computer for once. Usually, I always run into a few problems; however, this case offered plenty of room for my peripherals as well as a decent method for cable management! The case offers easy access to the computer and it shows off all of my lights! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: SOTK

customer_reviews.title: the fantastic cable management
customer_reviews.text: This case is incredible. The tempered glass all the way around, the fantastic cable management, and the solid workmanship make this a 5 star buy. Would and have recommended to friends and coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty massive with plenty of room for higher end pieces and plenty of air flow
customer_reviews.text: Glass panels allows you to enjoy any RGB pieces you have. Changing the light modes is pretty simple, there is airflow among all corner (2 and 3 sided corners, so pretty much everywhere) and it hold up to 6 fans in total. Running a massive 2080, an AMD 3700x, and a Corsair 1600(?) Watt battery and there is plenty of space, nothing is crowded, and everything has been great so far for the 6+ months I've had it. I didn't really appreciate it until I saw my friends custom built computer where they went with a much more compact metal case. It looked okay but it made me happier about just going for something a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis higgins

customer_reviews.title: Absolute steal for $120
customer_reviews.text: Amazing case, installed 3 x LL120 with the included 3 x SP120's. Its definitely a quality case, with enough room for almost any build. Honestly couldn't ask for anything nicer. For $60 off normal price I instantly bought it. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Bought Used-Like New condition. No scratches or anything, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought Used-Like New condition. No scratches or anything, and I was pleasantly surprised that they installed the PSU end cap so that my the cables from the PSU isnt visible from the show side.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case. RGB fans and lights are easy to see. The white interior color reflects the lights making it look like even more. I want to watch the case more than my monitor! LOL! Nice solid case. Plenty of filters and room for additional fans.
customer_reviews.author: Reh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case. Designed for aesthetics and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case. Designed for aesthetics and functionality. This case moves some air! One thing to note is the “fan controller” that’s included is only for the LED programming (flash sequence and color). You will either need to individually plug each fan into the motherboard or purchase a dedicated fan controller to operate the fans.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Glass exploded
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for more than a year and I have had no complaints until now. I was opening my case to add a new ssd and the glass exploded seriously I hadn't even lifted the glass off the case yet when it just exploded cut my and turned into little beeds. Now I have to find a new case so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Beware shattered glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass side panel shattered in to a million pieces when removing the protective film. Took at least an hour to clean up my new 3500 computer and the kitchen floor. The worst part was how Corsair customer service put me through the ringer to get a replacement. They wanted pictures of the glass (after I threw it away). Told me to send it back to Amazon (after it was already built). Kept giving me the run-around. I finally gave up and just purchased a new panel It seems their customer service lives up to their internet reputation of being worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Brill

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case. Can fit a 240mm top + 360mm front.
customer_reviews.text: Did a full custom loop in my 570x. Its tough to fit more than one rad. I have a 360mm in front and it leaves very little room for a res. Great looking case. Lots of room for wires behind mobo. Especially if you remove the rear shroud.
customer_reviews.author: Wirerat

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of using front panel space for the physical rgb control buttons. Cable channel needs to be a little bit bigger, and could use a psu shroud cover for the cable side to hide extra cable length. Also wish one of the cable cutouts was lined up even with the 24 pin connector so the cable could be routed straight out. Beautiful otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: dj BEER

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case with very nice features and great build ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case with very nice features and great build quality. Probably one of the best looking tempered glass cases out there. The mirrored version adds several new features like vertical gpu mounting and USB C, and a full PSU shroud compared to the old standard 570X, which is worth the difference in price.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case! Just need to upgrade the fan controller. Accidentely ordered the extra fans with a regular controller when I needed the set of fans with the pro controller.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just swapped my my PC into this case and I love it. Cable management in the back is super easy and the setup is nice. BE AWARE:This case dosent come with an exhaust fan or top fans so buy you need to buy those. Outside of that I have no real issues. Happy to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Maieutic_Rue

customer_reviews.title: High quality......... Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: great case......... use RGB fans and its quite the light show. HEAVY... those glass panels wieigh.
customer_reviews.author: Kafka45

customer_reviews.title: Confused about wiring.
customer_reviews.text: Used this tower to build my first computer with my son. The only complaint I have is, the instruction manual identified a couple of wires that did not exist. I believe it was the reset wires and led power wires. It took a lot of digging and head scratching to figure out that I didn't need them. The three sets of wires that were in there for the fans were in there and not identified. It all turned out well. I just wish the instructions were a little better as this was my son and I's very first build.
customer_reviews.author: donald martin

customer_reviews.title: One of the nicer cases I used in a build
customer_reviews.text: Case looks very nice finished. Everything about the case is nice. My only complaint is the corsair logos that light up on the case are white led and not rgb.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Looks dope
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Only issue I have is my case was running hot with a rx 580. No oc or anything. My CPU used a AIO corsair h110 cooker and was fine. I advise picking up another fan for the back. It really should have came with one for the back.
customer_reviews.author: J. hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Class
customer_reviews.text: The tint is amazing. Really tones down the LEDs while giving it a very, very premium look. Pain in the butt to remove the side panel for every little thing though and cable management is a bloody nightmare, but the end product is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aeriam

customer_reviews.title: An awesome upgrade to the already great 570X
customer_reviews.text: It's a better version of the already pretty good 570X. You lose one of the USB 3.0 type A ports, but you gain a USB 3.1 type C port, which is really nice if your motherboard has the appropriate header. You also get RGB versions of the Corsair logos on the front and side instead of the simple white ones on the normal 570X. They're even controllable in Corsair's software as if they were an SP RGB fan! The mirror finish is hard to photograph if the system isn't on. It's... Well, like trying to take pictures of a mirror, but when you put lights inside it, it's a work of art!
customer_reviews.author: JC Frizzell

product_meta.title: Corsair Crystal 570X RGB Mid-Tower Case, 3 RGB Fans, Tempered Glass - Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:570XWith immaculate tempered glass enclosing the entire chassis, every component of your build is on display for all to see. The CORSAIR Crystal Series 570X provides enough space for virtually any size radiator and support for up to six case fans. With the three included SP120 RGB LED fans and built-in LED controller, you can liven up your build with brilliant lighting effects. Case drive bays- 3.5 inch ,2.5 inch; Compatible corsair liquid coolers H55, H60, H75, H80i, H90, H100i, H105, H110
feature_bullets: Four tempered glass panels on the front, top, and sides of the case / Three included SP120 RGB LED fans and integrated RGB controller
Room for up to six case fans, and compatible with 360 millimeter, 280 millimeter, 240 millimeter, and 120 millimeter radiators / Removable fan trays in the front and top of the chassis
Cable routing channels with included velcro cable straps for clean cable management / Easy access high speed USB 3.0 front panel
Bright white LED backlit CORSAIR logo on front panel and PSU cover (removable); Case Material :Steel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,057 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
